lead_paragraph: As the Shabab showed off new recruits in a public ceremony, a senior official said members would be sent wherever jihad beckoned.
snippet: As the Shabab showed off new recruits in a public ceremony, a senior official said members would be sent wherever jihad beckoned.

headline.main: Somali Rebels Pledge to Send Fighters to Aid Yemen Jihad
headline.seo: Shabab Rebels in Somalia Say They’ll Send Fighters to Yemen
headline.print_headline: Somali Rebels Pledge to Send Fighters to Aid Yemen Jihad
